title: BRIEF-Total's Subsidiary Saft To Provide Batteries For Ergon Energy Network In Australia
text:
BRIEF-Total's Subsidiary Saft To Provide Batteries For Ergon Energy Network In Australia

Commodities 16 minutes ago (Oct 23, 2019 02:56)

BRIEF-Total's Subsidiary Saft To Provide Batteries For Ergon Energy Network In Australia Oct 22 (Reuters) - Total SA : * SUBSIDIARY SAFT SAYS WILL DEPLOY LITHIUM-ION ENERGY STORAGE SYSTEM FOR ERGON ENERGY NETWORK IN AUSTRALIA * SUBSIDIARY SAFT SAYS 20 LITHIUM-ION BATTERIES WILL BE DEPLOYED AT 13 SITES IN QUEENSLAND OVER 4 YEARS

BRIEF-Total's Subsidiary Saft To Provide Batteries For Ergon Energy Network In Australia
